title: arrayReduce
name: arrayReduce
description:
Iterates over every entry of the given array and calls the closure with every element.
		This function will reduce the array to a single value and will return the value.

arguments.name: closure
arguments.description: function/closure that implements the following constructor [function(any result, object value, [, numericindex [, array]]):any].

arguments.name: initalValue
arguments.description: inital value passed as part of the first closure call
